mcq.statement: In which sentence is the comma correctly placed? He was tired, so he took a nap., He was tired so, he took a nap., He was tired so he took, a nap., He was, tired so he took a nap.

options.a: He was tired, so he took a nap.
options.b: He was tired so, he took a nap.
options.c: He was tired so he took, a nap.
options.d: He was, tired so he took a nap.
